<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Maw of Hungry Shadows](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2181)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Grimoire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=387" />
<trait label="Incapacitation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=93" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Shadow" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=143" />
<trait label="Teleportation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=156" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 112 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 21,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Shadows swirl around this soot-black tome, swallowing up any light that touches them. A faint whispering emanates from the grimoire's pages when opened.

<document level="2" id="action-1678" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Maw of Hungry Shadows
